summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Fourteenth Avenue West, from the north margin of West Howe Street to the north margin of Gilman Avenue; Fifteenth Avenue West, from the south margin of West Newton Street to the north margin of West Armour Street; West Newton Street, West Boston Street and West Wheeler Street, each from Fourteenth Avenue West to Fifteenth Avenue West, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete or wooden sidewalks thereon, together with all necessary cross walks and appurtenances; in accordance with Resolution No. 1511 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
